title: Mini-Claw â€” AI Tool Review
description: Mini-Claw is a minimalist Telegram-based AI assistant inspired by OpenClaw, focused on core functionality with a small footprint. Mini-Claw is a lightweight, Telegram-based AI assistant inspired by OpenClaw. It provides core messaging interface and basic automation capabilities in a minimal package for self-hosted Telegram AI bots. Highlights: Very lightweight. Simple Telegram integration. Easy to self-host. Open-source.
